paragraphs: These are Writs of Execution (Morag Tongs, Dark Brotherhood, and The  Monarch of Morrowind).

The Bearer of this document, under special dispensation of the Night  Mother, who has entered in a contract in perpetuity with H, is given  special dispensation to execute <Name>, a <Race> recently  residing on the island of Vvardenfell. In accordance with all laws and  traditions, the afore-mentioned personage will be executed in the name  of H in the most expedient manner possible. All services of the Dark  Brotherhood are at the disposal of the Bearer of this binding and  non-disputable document.

The afore-mentioned personage has been marked for honorable execution in  accordance to the lawful tradition and practice of the Morag Tong  Guild. The Bearer of this non-disputable document has official  sanctioned license to kill the afore-mentioned personage.
